p: The roots are bitter, alterative and laxative and are used in the treatment of fever, skin irritation, rheumatism, gout, syphilitic cachexia and also in children for the treatment of stomach-ache [ 18, 21, 22, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31]. The extract of stems and roots are used as a sedative, hypotensive, cardiotonic and spasmolytic [ 25]. The root is made into paste and mixed with water and given orally to reduce stomach pain [ 32].
